fileTransfer
Class UnicastSender

java.lang.Object
  fileTransfer.UnicastSender

public class UnicastSender
extends java.lang.Object

Class responsible for attending requests to retrieve the contens of a local folder and send it to UnaCloud server

Parameters:
solicitud - UnaCloud server request to retrieve a folder

java.lang.Exception - If there is an error reading the requested folder

getFolderFiles

private java.io.File[] getFolderFiles(java.lang.String path)
Return a list of readable files to be send by the request attender

Parameters:
path - The folder path that must be examined
Returns:
An array containing the children files of the given folder path
